name: Ganyu - Lavender Desires [Animation]
summary:
Looks like someone couldn't wait for Keqing (｡> ‿ ◕｡) ❤️

Well, here's the new release! ❤️ ٩(๑•̀ω•́๑)۶ ❤️

The long-awaited project by Kitsune, which we were working on in parallel with Raiden x Yae, is finally complete and we are extremely happy to share it with you! (づ￣ ³￣)づ ❤️

Thank you so much for your ideas, support and love throughout the whole time of working on it! It was a great pleasure for us to develop this idea from a simple pose concept to a full animation! (っˆڡˆς)❤️

After all, as usual, this project was originally conceived as just a small pose for Ganyu, on which Kitsune planned to spend a couple of evenings and send it to release. But as always, thanks to your suggestions and ideas, we have gone much further, and now (despite the fact that what you see before you is just a 1 cycle animation) this has become one of our most detailed and wholesome animations! And when we started applying new textures and shaders to the skin, Ganyu and Keqing became literally the best! (っ^ ◡ ^c)❤️

Huge thanks to
info:
• 中文名: 甘雨-薰衣草的欲望
  • 作者: ViciNeko
  • 上映年度: 2022年7月18日
  • 片长: 3分
